entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:35 a.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.4Â°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with snow this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this morning. Temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
